entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character in the story, referred to as 'Harry'.

entities.name: percy
entities.description: Percy is a person who is described as being uncertain and airily responding to Harry's question.

entities.name: dudley
entities.description: Dudley is Harry's cousin, who takes food from Harry even if it makes him sick.

relationships.description: Harry asks Percy a question about whether he is mad.
Percy responds to Harry's question by saying that he is a genius but also a bit mad.
Dudley takes food from Harry, even if it makes him sick.
